topic: Describe a book you read that you found useful.
bullets: Explain how you felt about it

topic: Describe a time when you helped a child.
bullets: Explain how you felt about it

topic: Describe a competition you would like to take part in.
bullets: What kind of competition it is
What you would need to do
How you would prepare for it

bullets: Explain how you felt after the conversation

topic: Describe a place you visited where the air was polluted.
bullets: Why the air was not clean

topic: Describe a skill you learned from an older person.
bullets: Explain how this skill has helped you

topic: Describe a successful small business that you know.
bullets: Explain why you think it is successful
